original_text:
Gonzo’s Quest
Informazioni generali
Software: NetEnt
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 20
Puntata massima: 50 €
Minimo gettoni per linea: 1
Massimo gettoni per linea: 10
Autoplay: presente
Montepremi: 112.500 €
Return to Player (RTP): 95,9%

Gonzo’s Quest Tema e grafica
Gonzo’s Quest è una slot ispirata di casa NetEnt ispirata al tema dei conquistadores spagnoli, partiti dall’America alla volta della mitica città di Eldorado, nella giungla dello Yucatan, con lo scopo di portarsi a casa il leggendario tesoro nascosto! Il protagonista del gioco è un conquistador di nome Gonzalo Pizarro (Gonzo), che ruba la mappa del tesoro per poter tenere per sé tutto il malloppo.
La grafica di Gonzo’s Quest è veramente eccezionale: una tecnologia 3D vi permetterà persino di vedere i simboli esplodere sulla schermata quando si attiveranno le funzioni speciali!
Inoltre, in seguito a una vincita di qualsiasi entità ai lati della schermata l’esploratore Gonzo in persona festeggerà con voi sorprendendovi con dei balletti e persino passeggiando sulla luna!
Oltre alla grafica, sono da segnalare anche gli effetti sonori che riproducono i versi degli animali selvaggi, per un’esperienza di gioco molto realistica che vi farà sentire nel bel mezzo della giungla!

Simboli, Wild e Scatter
I simboli di Gonzo’s Quest, in linea con l’ambientazione nella città di Eldorado, sono tutti a tema Maya e includono vari animali e maschere riprodotti come se fossero scolpiti in lastre di pietra. Tra i simboli troviamo un serpente, un uccello, un alligatore e un pesce, abbiamo poi il fuoco, la luna, il simbolo Gold Mayan e un punto interrogativo.
Non sono invece presenti i numeri e le lettere relativi alle carte da poker.
Il simbolo del punto interrogativo rappresenta il Wild e come tale può sostituire tutti gli altri simboli per completare un allineamento vincente.

Modalità di gioco di Gonzo’s Quest
Prima di iniziare a far girare i rulli di questa slot, è necessario selezionare il valore di ogni gettone, che va da un minimo di 0,01 € fino a un massimo di 50 €, il numero di linee su cui di desidera giocare e il numero di gettoni complessivi da puntare, da 1 fino a 10.000!
Interessanti le funzionalità speciali di Gonzo’s Quest, Free Fall e Avalanche.

Free Fall: questa funzione si attiva quando si allineano sui rulli, a partire da destra, tre simboli Gold Mayan. Quando si gioca in modalità Free Fall, oltre ad avere la possibilità di ottenere dei giri gratuiti, in caso di vincita si passa automaticamente alla modalità Avalanche.
Avalanche: si tratta di una funzionalità innovativa che determina maggiori possibilità di vincita. Quando si ottiene una combinazione vincente, infatti, tutti i simboli che la costituiscono esplodono e sono rimpiazzati da altri simboli che cadono dall’alto e che possono creare a loro volta delle nuove combinazioni vincenti.

La modalità Avalanche va avanti finché si creano allineamenti vincenti, ma non è tutto: quando si vince per la seconda volta, il premio sarà raddoppiato e così via per le volte successive, fino a un massimo di 15 volte.
Il moltiplicatore si ottiene anche durante i giri in modalità regolare, la differenza è che in questo caso si potrà raddoppiare la vincita fino a un massimo di cinque volte.

raw_translation.response:
Gonzo's Quest
General Information
Software: NetEnt
Reels: 5
Paylines: 20
Max Bet: €50
Minimum Coins per Line: 1
Maximum Coins per Line: 10
Autoplay: Available
Jackpot: €112,500
Return to Player (RTP): 95.9%

Theme and Graphics of Gonzo's Quest
Gonzo's Quest is an adventure-packed slot game from NetEnt inspired by the Spanish conquistadors who set out to find El Dorado, the legendary city of gold hidden in the Yucatan jungle. The game's protagonist is a conquistador named Gonzo who steals the treasure map to keep all the loot for himself. 

The graphics in Gonzo's Quest are truly exceptional, with stunning 3D technology that allows the symbols to explode on the screen during special features. When you land a win, Gonzo himself celebrates with you by dancing and even walking on the moon. The game's sound effects, which replicate the sounds of wild animals, make for a realistic gaming experience that will transport you straight into the heart of the jungle.

Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters
The symbols in Gonzo's Quest are all relevant to the theme of Eldorado and the Mayan civilization, featuring various animals and masks carved in stone. The symbols include a snake, bird, alligator, and fish, as well as fire, the moon, the Gold Mayan symbol, and a question mark. There are no numbers or letters representing playing cards in this game. The question mark acts as a Wild symbol, replacing any other symbol to complete a winning combination.

Gameplay in Gonzo's Quest
Before spinning the reels, you need to select the value of each coin, which can range from a minimum of €0.01 to a maximum of €50, the number of paylines you wish to play, and the number of coins you want to bet, up to 10,000. 

Gonzo's Quest features two exciting special features: Free Fall and Avalanche. When you align three Gold Mayan symbols starting from the right-hand side, the Free Fall feature is activated. With Free Fall, you not only have the chance to win free spins but also automatically trigger the Avalanche feature whenever you score a win. 

Avalanche is an innovative feature that increases your chances of winning. When you land a winning combination, all the symbols that contribute to it explode and are replaced by other symbols that fall from above, creating even more potential winning combinations. This feature continues as long as you keep winning. Each time you win for the second time, your prize is doubled, and the multiplier increases up to 15 times. 

The multiplier can also be awarded during regular spins, except that in this case, it can double your winnings up to five times.

In summary, Gonzo's Quest is a thrilling adventure slot game that transports you to the heart of the jungle in search of Eldorado's treasure. With its stunning graphics, realistic sound effects, and innovative features, this game is a must-play for any experienced gambler.

Gonzo's Quest is a thrilling NetEnt slot inspired by the Spanish conquistadors who set out from America to find the fabled city of El Dorado in the Yucatan jungle, in search of its legendary hidden treasure. The game features the protagonist, conquistador Gonzalo Pizarro (Gonzo), who steals the treasure map in the hope of keeping all the loot for himself. 
The 3D graphics in Gonzo's Quest are simply amazing as they allow you to witness symbols exploding on the screen as special features are activated! As an added bonus, whenever you win, the explorer Gonzo himself celebrates with you, performing dances and even walking on the moon! Symbols, Wilds and Scatters:
The symbols in Gonzo's Quest recreate the atmosphere of the city of El Dorado. They feature various animals and masks sculpted out of stone in the Maya style. Free Falls: This feature activates when three Gold Mayan symbols line up on the reels starting from the right. When playing in Free Falls mode, players have the chance to earn free spins. Moreover, upon winning, they automatically proceed to the Avalanche mode. 

Avalanche: This innovative feature increases the chances of winning as well as the excitement! When landing a winning combination, all symbols that constituted the alignment explode and are replaced by new ones that fall from above, creating further winning combinations. The Avalanche mode continues until there are no more winning alignments. What's more, when a player wins for the second time, their prize is doubled, and this multiplier increases for each subsequent win up to an incredible 15x. The multiplier also applies during regular spins, and it is possible to double your win up to a maximum of five times. 

In conclusion, Gonzo's Quest is an enthralling and exciting slot machine that offers a generous jackpot, an RTP of 95.9%, and thrilling bonus features. Don't hesitate and set out on your own quest for untold riches with Gonzo today!

Review:
 
3D Graphics and Sound Effects

The 3D graphics in Gonzo's Quest are simply amazing as they allow you to witness symbols exploding on the screen as special features are activated! Players can also enjoy realistic sound effects that feature wild animal calls, adding to an immersive gaming experience.

Special Features - Free Falls and Avalanche

The game features two exciting special functions – Free Falls and Avalanche. Free Falls mode activates when three Gold Mayan symbols line up on the reels starting from the right. When playing in Free Falls mode, players have the chance to earn free spins. Upon winning, they automatically proceed to the Avalanche mode. Avalanche mode increases the chances of winning as well as the excitement! When landing a winning combination, all symbols that constituted the alignment explode and are replaced by new ones that fall from above, creating further winning combinations. The Avalanche mode continues until there are no more winning alignments.

Inspiration from Spanish Conquistadors and Maya Culture

Gonzo's Quest is a thrilling slot inspired by the Spanish conquistadors who set out from America to find the fabled city of El Dorado in the Yucatan jungle, in search of its legendary hidden treasure. The game features the protagonist, conquistador Gonzalo Pizarro (Gonzo), who steals the treasure map in the hope of keeping all the loot for himself. The symbols in Gonzo's Quest recreate the atmosphere of the city of El Dorado. They feature various animals and masks sculpted out of stone in the Maya style.

Symbols and Atmosphere of El Dorado

The symbols in Gonzo's Quest recreate the atmosphere of the city of El Dorado. They feature various animals and masks sculpted out of stone in the Maya style. Among the symbols are a snake, a bird, an alligator, a fish, and depictions of fire, the moon, the Gold Mayan symbol, and a question mark. The poker symbols such as numbers and letters are not included. The question mark symbol represents the Wild and can replace all other symbols to complete a winning alignment.

Potential to Win a Generous Jackpot

Before spinning the reels of this slot machine, players must select the value of each token, which ranges from a minimum of €0.01 to a maximum of €50. The game offers a generous jackpot of €112,500 and an RTP of 95.9%. The multiplier also applies during regular spins, and it is possible to double your win up to a maximum of five times.
